SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class GameFlowManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameFlowManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class GameFlowManager extends Object implements Runnable
This class allows to manage a single game. It's the middle point between the clients and the game model. Implemented as a runnable in order to be able to run more games on a single server. Uses a state pattern to manage the flow of the game. Uses the command pattern to keep track of every player's moves.
See Also:
  • GameState
  • GameCommand
  • GameModelUpdater

  • Field Details

    • gameModelUpdater

      public GameModelUpdater gameModelUpdater
      Part of the controller that updates the model. Middle point between GameFlowManager and GameState.

    • lobbyId

      public final int lobbyId
      Stores the id of the lobby, or the "room" containing the players

    • users

      public List<UserInfo> users
      List containing all in game users.

    • observers

      public final List<Observer> observers
      List of observers (the clients connected), which will be notified for every event thrown.

    • commands

      public final Queue<GameCommand> commands
      Queue of commands sent by the players. Every move made by a player is identified by a command. Implemented as a blocking queue.

    • userInfoToToken

      public final Map<UserInfo,PlayerToken> userInfoToToken
      Map from UserInfo of players to their token.

    • playerTokens

      public final List<PlayerToken> playerTokens
      List of tokens playing.

    • turn

      Integer to keeps track of the turn number.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameFlowManager

      public GameFlowManager(Lobby lobby, Map<UserInfo,Supplier<Boolean>> isConnected, List<Observer> observers, int timeLimit)
      Main constructor for the class.
      Parameters:
      lobby - lobby from which the game was started
      isConnected - map from user to a connection boolean, used to skip turn if client is no more connected
      observers - list of observers

    • GameFlowManager

      public GameFlowManager(Lobby lobby, Map<UserInfo,Supplier<Boolean>> isConnected, List<Observer> observers)
      Constructor of the class without specifying the time limit. Default time limit set to 120 seconds.
      Parameters:
      lobby - lobby from which the game was started
      isConnected - map from user to a connection boolean, used to skip turn if client is no more connected
      observers - list of observers

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Override of the Runnable::run method. As soon as the thread is started, the setup phase begins, where players choose their token, starter card and objective card. Then the in-game phase starts, where players place and draw cards, until someone reaches the limit score. When the game ends, the post-game phase starts.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • setState

      public void setState(GameState nextState)
      Allows to change GameFlowManager's current state.
      Parameters:
      nextState - next state

    • addCommand

      public void addCommand(GameCommand command)
      Adds a command to the commands queue.
      Parameters:
      command - the command representing the player's move

    • forwardMessage

      public void forwardMessage(MessageEvent message)
      Forwards the message event to all players.
      Parameters:
      message - the message event to forward

    • drawRandomCard

      public void drawRandomCard(PlayerToken playerToken)
      Used to fill a player's hand when he exceeds his time limit.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - token that represents the player

    • getTurn

      public PlayerToken getTurn()
      Returns:
      token of the player whose turn it is, null if in a state where turns don't exist

    • getRound

      public int getRound()
      Returns:
      the round

    • switchTurn

      public void switchTurn()
      Manages the turns, the rounds and checks whether the next turn will be the last.

    • notify

      public void notify(GameEvent gameEvent)
      Updates clients on a certain event. Used mainly during "setup" phase
      Parameters:
      gameEvent - event to send to clients

    • setGameModelUpdater

      public void setGameModelUpdater(GameModelUpdater gameModelUpdater)
      GameModelUpdater and GameModel are instantiated only after setup phase is finished.
      Parameters:
      gameModelUpdater - the newly instantiated GameModelUpdater

    • initializeGameStates

      public void initializeGameStates()
      Side method to set up some game states, that require a GameModelUpdater given as parameter.
